Articles.Content:
We need some more people on our team, developing an addon package using KerbTown.

The content is being kept secret except to the few people who apply to be a part of the team.

What we are looking for:

One 3D modeler with good experience and skill at both modeling and texturing

Two modelers or artists that know enough to get by, to help with smaller "prop" type models that will be used as part of the main models by the lead modeler.

One Sound engineer, experienced or novice. Many of the objects will be animated and have unique sounds that will need to be sourced or created. This is not a demanding aspect of the development, so having some skill in 3d Modeling and/or texturing would also help. Barring that, just wanting to be helpful with storyboarding can never go wrong

I will require a few samples of your work if you would like to apply for the lead modeler

there are potentially two or three more positions for people that have played a lot of quest based games or MMO's that will be willing to help with the story-line aspect of development.

Programming skills are an asset but even basic knowledge of C# or Unity will get you by to start with.

We have a development forum setup as of this morning where most of the work will take place, due to timezone limitations (someone seriously needs to update this whole Day/Night cycle being opposite on the other side of the world... its been irking me for 31 years..)

Skype will be another key component

Sorry for the "To the point" post, I just got off another 15 hour night shift and am extremely sleep deprived. Just needed to get this posted and out in the public

You can either reply here or send me a PM if you are interested. I do want to keep the content we are developing somewhat secret so it gets a better response when it's finally released. That plus I don't want to be one of those guys that promises some awesome mod then gets flamed for months and months while there's no proof of its existence.

We are waiting to hear back from two people,, a programmer and a sound engineer. Besides that we are pretty much staffed up!

until we start putting out content and know how much of a load this will be on the team we don't NEED more people, however if you are interested, we could always use another modeler or artist
I would be glad to model for you. Just pm me and I will send my Skype name or Steam name.
